          <title>
            <string language="et">Loomade tundmine</string>
            <string language="en">Get to know the animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beginnen Sie, die Tiere zu kennen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Finissez par connaître les animaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conheça os animais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Familiarizzisi con gli animali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνωρίστε να ξέρετε τα ζώα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Familiarícese con los animales</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Programmiga Kidspiration loodud tööleht, kus on vaja tunda koduloomi, metsloomi ja kodulinde.</string>
            <string language="en">Kidspiration worksheet where children have to recognize domestic animals, wild animals and domestic birds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Loodus</string>
            <string language="et">Loomad</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Nature</string>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kidspiration Bogen, wo Kinder Haustiere, wilde 
Tiere und inländische Vögel erkennen müssen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau de Kidspiration où les enfants doivent 
identifier les animaux domestiques, les animaux sauvages et les 
oiseaux domestiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha de Kidspiration onde as crianças têm que 
reconhecer animais domésticos, animais selvagens e pássaros 
domésticos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro di Kidspiration dove i bambini 
devono riconoscere gli animali domestici, gli animali selvaggi e gli 
uccelli domestici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας Kidspiration όπου τα παιδιά πρέπει 
να αναγνωρίσουν τα κατοικίδια ζώα, τα άγρια ζώα και τα εσωτερικά
πουλιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo de Kidspiration donde los niños 
tienen que reconocer animales domésticos, animales salvajes y 
pájaros domésticos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
